battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player.ai

Class Focus

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player.ai.Focus

  • public class Focus
extends Object
    The class handles situations where the computer player has bombed a square with a ship part in it and needs to figure out where the rest of the ship is.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Focus(ComputerGuessingPattern cgp, Square squareOfOrigin, Player foe) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isActive() 
      Square prospect()
      Decides the next Square to bomb based on either: guessing the next square if the Focus has no previous hits other than the square given as a constructor parameter, or deciding the next possible square based on previous hits

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

     Square squareOfOrigin,

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()

      • prospect

        public Square prospect()
        Decides the next Square to bomb based on either:
        1. guessing the next square if the Focus has no previous hits other than the square given as a constructor parameter, or
        2. deciding the next possible square based on previous hits
        Returns:
        the chosen Square
